page.title: 12SWAFFHAM LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Swaffham Leisure Centre is situated between South Greenhoe and Hamonds High School. The money for the centre was funded by the Breckland District Council and Town Council.This centre was the first of its kind offering sports for Educational and leisure purposes.The equipment was provided by the education committee and the County Council. Swaffham Leisure Centre also sends out leaflets about future activities during school holidays.Sports featured at the centre are badminton,squash, 5-a-side soccer,gym,judo and basketball,sometimes they hold a funday with 2 trampolines,1 bouncy castle,a little disco and triskating.
